summary: Adds a point buy system of beneficial and detrimental traits. Make your character a bit more unique.
descriptionHtml:
Requires SKSE:  http://skse.silverlock.org/

After choosing your race you can add positive and negative traits to your character via scripted books.
What you can choose and what not is dependent on your chosen race and influences the game more than the race alone. 
The positive traits must be balanced with negative ones, should you have spare points (more valuable negative traits than positive ones) the difference will be added as perk points(this requires skse) 

If you have any idea of an easy to implement trait you can post it in a comment.

Recommended Mods to go along with this:
Live another life - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557 (an almost must have imo)
author: BeelzebossErik

files.name: Character traits
files.changelogHtml:
The system works even if your level is greater than three but you need to add the startup book via console.
Very minor change to magica regeneration(down for non elven/breton races) to match those in my upcoming mini-overhaul
